"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.staticImage2","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage2","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$MicrosoftTeams_image__40_.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}},{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Franchising"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"56.S.Franchsing.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"TextSince its inception in 1984, Titan Company Ltd continues to grow and set new standards for innovation and quality. With more than 1300 retail outlets across over 260 towns, having a carpet area of over 1.8 million sq. ft., it has India's largest retail network.

Titan Company is the fifth largest integrated own brand watch manufacturer in the world. Titan is India's largest watch retailer, with over 470 exclusive World of Titan stores and 159 Fastrack stores & kiosks, investment in stores starts from 40* lacs (World of Titan) & 20* lacs (Fastrack) respectively. In 1994, Titan Company launched 'Tanishq', India's most trusted and leading jewellery brand. Today, Tanishq operates as the largest jewellery retailer in India, has over 218 exclusive Tanishq boutiques and Zoya stores, investment in boutiques start from 1.5* Crs. Titan Company ventured into the eyewear category through Titan Eyeplus in 2007. The brand has a retail presence of over 467 Titan Eyeplus stores, investment starts from 30* lacs. Titan Company is backed by over 7,000 employees and innumerable admirers world over.

*Estimated investments - actuals will vary depending on the size of the store & the location."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
